imageStack.name: label
imageStack.documentation: A text label associated with the image.

imageStack.name: contentOntology
imageStack.documentation: The ontology node id(s) describing the imageStack in a comma-seperated list of ontology:nodeID (e.g 'EMPTY:00000090,UBERON:3373').

imageStack.name: formatOntology
imageStack.documentation: The ontology node describing the file format in the form of ontology:nodeID (e.g 'EMPTY:00000090').
